quiz.question: How does exercise help manage stress?

quiz.question: Which of the following is an example of social support in stress management?

options.b: Spending time with friends or family

quiz.question: What does time management help to prevent?

options.b: Overwhelm and stress due to missed deadlines

quiz.question: Why is role management important in stress management?

options.a: To avoid confusion about job roles
options.b: To prevent role ambiguity and overload

quiz.question: What is a key aspect of adjusting life goals to manage stress?

options.b: Avoiding any changes to long-term goals
options.c: Breaking down big goals into smaller, manageable steps
